actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 11, title 38, United States Code, to provide a statutory compensable rating of not less than 10 percent for any veteran who was a prisoner of war.

summary.text: Provides that any veteran of the United States Armed Forces who has been held as a prisoner of war, or was detained by an enemy agent of the United States, shall be deemed to have suffered a permanent disability and entitled to a disability rating of not less than 10 percent following such service. (Adds 38U.S.C. 363).

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 11, title 38, United States Code, to provide a statutory compensable rating of not less than 10 percent for any veteran who was a prisoner of war.
